item.title: Streamlining .NET 9 Deployment With GitHub Actions and Azure
item.description: Code Faster With Amazon Q. Amazon Q Developer is your AI-powered coding companion that helps developers build, operate, and transform software with intelligent assistance at every step of the development lifecycle. Accelerate your workflow with line-by-line code suggestions and quality improvements in your favorite IDE. Get expert AWS guidance on architecture, troubleshooting, and resource optimization. Transform existing applications and automate upgrades without starting from scratch. Learn more in the AWS Developer Center.

item.title: Better Request Tracing with User Context in ASP.NET Core
item.description: Adding user context to request tracing in ASP.NET Core helps track issues and understand user behavior. This article shows how to implement middleware that enriches logs with user IDs for better troubleshooting and performance monitoring. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/better-request-tracing-with-user-context-in-asp-net-core
